amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to require the Secretary of the Department of Veterans Affairs to list open mental health positions in the database established under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Shea-Porter.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
